title: Her Dragon
description: ASSASSINS. ROYALTY. DRAGONS.Rhapsody’s adventures continue in book three of this steamy reverse harem fantasy filled with danger, romance, and intrigue.Rhapsody finds herself captured by the king’s royal guards, taking far away from the palace and her kindreds. The king is determined to silence her voice and the dissent he fears her songs will bring.She makes her escape only to end up in the clutches of the dragons and brought to their city in the harsh mountains.There, she must use all her cunning and her music to stay alive and do whatever she can to further the princess’s plot to overthrow the king. No matter what it takes.If she wants to be reunited with her kindreds, she’ll have to find allies in this community of secretive killers and fight with her songs to pave the way for a treaty with Faligrey.
author: Helene Gadot
